STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Fix It With Felicia Link to Today's Recording Today's topic: Traffic Officer Activity - Designed especially for Supervisors, learn what resources Perform Software has to allow you to track Officer Activity. DATE: Every Second Thursday of the Month TIME: 11:00 AM ET l 10:00 AM CT l 9:00 AM MT l 8:00 AM PT PRESENTER: Felicia Donovan, TriTech Client Services INVITE OTHER PERFORM SOFTWARE USERS: http://offers.tritech.com/FwF_Registration.html <http://offers.tritech.com/FwF_Registration.html>
See You Next Month! WEBINAR RECORDING RECORDING LINK <recordings.tritech.co/MA/Customer/FwF/04-11-13.wmv>
